attributes.action: To have full working CCTV in ALL PARKS and all ROADS & ALLY'S
attributes.background: There are to many crimes that happen but don't have CCTV  footage of the  incidents  which  doesn't  help to investigate the crime .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The installation of CCTV in public areas is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require all councils to provide CCTV in parks, roads and alleyways, you could start a new petition asking for that.
